name: Baldi's Basics Horror Edition Remastered
description:
Baldi's Basics Horror Edition Remastered!

Baldi has been a normal and terrifying horror game, now with this mod you will change the taste of the original game to extreme terror, get ready to fight Baldi.exe D:

Credits

The original game made by Micah McGonigal

Mod by EddyGames YT

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Paint 3D
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • AssetBundleExtractor
  • Resource Hacker

Original mod made by Sonickid Gaming and Sanspirate
